name: Hell of Fame Game
description:
Hell Of Fame is a side isometric camera action game in which you will 
handle William Von Famous, a celebrity who constantly suffers 
the weight of fame.

William's goal is to get to different points of Famewood safely while 
avoiding the hordes of fans trying to corner him to ask for a selfie.

  • Run away from your fans
  • Use your skills
  • Interact with the environment

You can play using your controller or keyboard !

If you encounter any BUGS PLEASE let us know so we can squash em! 
And if you have any comments you want to share we highly encourage you to let us know.

This are our active social media accounts, in case you want to FOLLOW us
for more updates on HELL OF FAME !
